lead_paragraph: Bob and Mike Bryan spoiled Lleyton Hewitt's Davis Cup comeback by closing out a tense 6-3 6-3 4-6 4-6 6-3 doubles win that put the United States 2-1 ahead in their first round tie in Melbourne.

headline.print_headline: Bryan Brothers Crush Hewitt Comeback, Put U.S. Ahead
headline.main: Bryan Brothers Crush Hewitt Comeback, Put U.S. Ahead

snippet: Bob and Mike Bryan spoiled Lleyton Hewitt's Davis Cup comeback by closing out a tense 6-3 6-3 4-6 4-6 6-3 doubles win that put the United States 2-1 ahead in their first round tie in Melbourne....
